context: The Estonian word 'lõppes' is the past tense form of the verb 'lõppea', which means 'to end' or 'to finish'. It indicates that an action or period has been completed. In the dictionary definition provided, it's used in the context of heinaaeg (hay season) ending and lõikus (harvesting) beginning on Jaagupipäev (St. James' Day). The word is commonly used to describe when activities, periods of time, or events come to a close.
